Package fr.dauphine.robombastic.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArenaCell
    Represents an element that is on the Grid.
    Bomb
    Represents a bomb in the game
    BotContextImpl
    Context unique to each bot.
    CurrentBotInfoImpl
    Informations available for the current bot
    FRRobot
    Implementation of Robot - French army
    Game
    Game Engine - Core of the game
    GeneralInfoImpl
    Implementation of GeneralInfo - Represents the informations given to the bot by the game Usage of Singleton Pattern to be sure to have only one instance of the class shared among all other classes
    Grid
    Represents the grid in term of object management (i.e : the real grid behind the graphical one).
    Message
    Class used to encapsulate the action sent in the queue.
    PositionImpl
    Implementation of Position
    Robot
    Represents a bot in the game
    RobotUtils
    Useful methods for the bots
    RURobot
    Implementation of Robot - Russian Army
    USRobot
    Implementation of Robot - US Army
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HelperAction
    Helper technique to "merge" the enum that implements Action marker interface
